DataElement.preferredName: Prior Tumor Treating Fields Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indication of whether or not a patient meets the criteria for participation in a clinical trial regarding prior tumor treating fields therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Tumor Treating Fields Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:A type of electromagnetic field therapy that uses low-intensity, intermediate-frequency alternating electrical fields to a target area to induce selective toxicity to proliferating cells._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Tumor Treating Fields Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A type of electromagnetic field therapy that uses low-intensity, intermediate-frequency alternating electrical fields to a target area to induce selective toxicity to proliferating cells._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A type of electromagnetic field therapy that uses low-intensity, intermediate-frequency alternating electrical fields to a target area to induce selective toxicity to proliferating cells.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
